reviewText:
Import Blu-Ray/Region All pressing.

On 14 May 2011, 35 years of hurt were ended for Manchester City fans as team captain Carlos Tevez ascended the famous Wembley steps to raise the FA Cup. Now Manchester City fans can relive their long-awaited success time and time again thanks to this fantastic DVD. As well as giving you the chance to rewatch City's FA Cup final triumph in full, we've also included every minute of that semi-final victory over United--not to mention a special `Road to Wembley' featurette taking you every step of the way along City's march to FA Cup glory. The wait for a trophy is over. The Blue Moon is rising once again.
